question: When Allah commands us to seek out knowledge, what type of knowledge is it?(Is it only DEENY)
answer:

ANSWER

Mufti Ebrahim Desai

Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) is reported to have said, 'The
pursuit of knowledge is a compulsion upon every Muslim.'

This Hadith clearly shows the obligation of seeking knowledge. This
knowledge refers to basic knowledge relating to the integral aspects of
Deen.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
